message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its unique features and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exceptional price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer allows you to save $250,000 compared to its perceived value, making it a highly attractive deal. I am confident that you will find this investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
